message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a steal at $220. I know you'll love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's way out of my budget. I could do $50.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand that $220 is a bit high, so how about we meet in the middle at $180?
Hmm, $180 is still a bit too steep for me.  Could you do $65?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, I can't go any lower than $150 for this item. It's a fantastic deal at this price!
